title: Regal Vista!
map_address: 3475 Pleasantbrook Village Ln near Pleasantdale Rd
posting_body: Regal Vista, located in Doraville, Georgia, offer spacious 1, 2,and 3 bedroom floor plans with many options.
Interior features include full size washer and dryer connections, optional fireplaces, decorative chair rails in the dining areas, vaulted ceilings and optional upgrades.
Our community boasts a sparkling swimming pool, playground, a sport court with jogging trail and updated fitness center.
We are close to shopping and dining, Santé Fe Mall, Gwinnett Arena, Emory Hospital and public transit.
